 The frist time link Freeman Rdmed me i had just killed a traitor and the dective says im innocent and i take out my knife and asked the dective if he wunts it and then link comes in and says mr pandora is the traitor and i had my knife out so i didnt care that much
until in dead chat he started spaming U MAD? UMAD BRO? thats when it got annoying
the second time was with his freind dr nobody i went into the elevator room and was going to go up the elevator and he shot me with his m16 and said i tryed to shot him and then taking my gun later i looked at his body and saw he was inonnocent 
the third time i thought he was ghosting because his freind was traitor and he got 2 traitor rdm kills including me in plain sight and got away with it cause he some how knew i was the traitor with 0 kills and 0 bullets missing and he allso killed another guy for example the console picture

Oh, and I don't believe you can have witnessess account for you, there was a new rule I think that one of the higher up admins said.

well how does dr. nobody killing you have to do with me? the first rdm when you were a traitor was actually rdm and i admitted that; but i didn't rdm kropfi, i was turning left when i was walking out of a door turning right and my mouse hit my keyboard and clicked thus firing a shot, killing the already near death Kropfi. And those were both two different round in which i rdmed you once in each which, as we all know, has no punishment. If anything i would get a 4 hour ban or something.

The second time it did happen, and link quit.

In my opinion link is a very respectful person.

See link, this is why VIP cant have nice things.
Mute him on your end or something. Don't RDM him. I know Pandora, and hes never done anything to be annoying, and he doesn't. The only reason I can possibly see you finding him annoying is because of his accent, which would be a double whammy for racism and rdm.
I say either a temp ban or removal of VIP.
For just two rdms? I hardly think that's fair.

Its defiantly fair considering you just admitted to rdming because you found him annoying.
You're supposed to uphold the rules not break them. And clearly you've been doing that a lot.
